block.p: BASEBALL
American League BOSTON RED SOX -- Exercised the option on RHP Pedro Martinez for the 2004 season.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS -- Placed C Rod Barajas on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Robby Hammock from Tucson of the PCL. CINNCINNATI REDS -- Placed OF Ken Griffey, Jr. on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to April 6.
California League SAN JOSE GIANTS -- Announced OF Micah Holst has been transferred to Fresno of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jeremy Schmidt from extended spring training.
Atlantic League SOMERSET PATRIOTS -- Re-signed LHP Robert Dodd.

Central League AMARILLO DILLAS -- Signed RHP Marshall Nisbett. COASTAL BEND AVIATORS -- Signed OF Matt Mann and OF Mark Okano. EDINBURG ROADRUNNERS -- Signed RHP Ryan Harris and C Eddie Fitzpatrick. FORT WORTH CATS -- Signed RHP John Carroll, LHP Marck Hickey and 1B-OF Shawn Greene. RIO GRANDE VALLEY WHITEWINGS -- Signed RHP Kevin Kuklis. SAN ANGELO COLTS -- Signed RHP Quentin Jones. SHREVEPORT SPORTS -- Released C Jerry Valdez and RHP Rob Vael.

Northeast League ALLENTOWN AMBASSADORS -- Released RHP John Lunney. BANGOR LUMBERJACKS -- Released OF David Jefferson, C Daling Rengifo and RHP Denny Lail. BERKSHIRE BLACK BEARS -- Released INF Rickey Gutierrez. ELMIRA PIONEERS -- Signed RHP Chris Keelin. NEW JERSEY JACKALS -- Signed RHP Matthew Pike. NORTH SHORE SPIRIT -- Released SS Miguel Vilorio.
Nothern League JOLIET JACKHAMMERS -- Traded C Erik Shafer and OF Franklin German to Lincoln for SS Eddy De Los Santos.
BASKETBALL
National Basketball Association CHICAGO BULLS -- Announced the resignation of Jerry Krause, executive vice president of basketball operations.
FOOTBALL
National Football League NEW YORK GIANTS -- Signed RB Dorsey Levens to a three-year contract. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS -- Signed DE Chike Okeafor to a two-year contract.
Canadian Football League TORONTO ARGONAUTS -- Re-signed RB Michael Jenkins.
HOCKEY

National Hockey League FLORIDA PANTHERS -- Reassigned C Byron Ritchie to San Antonio of the AHL. LOS ANGELES KINGS -- Assigned C Sean Avery, D Joe Corvo, LW Ryan Flinn, D Jason Holland, G Cristobal Huet, C Steve Kelly, C Jerred Smithson and D Tomas Zizka to Manchester of the AHL. NEW YORK RANGERS -- Named Don Maloney general manager of Hartford of the AHL.

American Hockey League BRIDGEPORT SOUND TIGERS -- Released C Konrad McKay. Reassigned D Daniel Tetrault and D Duston Wood to Trenton of the ECHL. Announced RW Marco Charpentier has been reassigned to Trenton by the N.Y. Islanders of the NHL.
East Coast Hockey League PENSACOLA ICE PILOTS -- Announced G Maxime Gingras has been called up by Springfield of the AHL.
TENNIS USTA -- Named Dan James director of program development, USA Tennis wheelchair high performance.

COLLEGE ALCORN STATE -- Named Samuel West men's basketball coach. INDIANA -- Announced Terry Clapacs, interim athletic director, will stay on for at least one year. MILLSAPS -- Named Tim Wise men's basketball coach.
